abstract: Pres Obama, during his speech at journalism prize ceremony honoring late New York Times political reporter Robin Toner, laments circus-like atmosphere of 2016 presidential campaign and urges journalists to be more critical while covering issues.

headline.print_headline: Obama Urges Journalists to Cover the Substantive
headline.main: Obama Urges Journalists to Cover the Substance of the Campaign

snippet: Speaking at a journalism prize ceremony on Monday, President Obama lamented the circuslike atmosphere of the 2016 presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: Speaking at a journalism prize ceremony on Monday, President Obama lamented the circuslike atmosphere of the 2016 presidential campaign.
